title: Effect of ferrous sulfate treatment on microbially influenced corrosion of CuNi 70/30 marine pipeline alloy by sulfate reducing bacteria
content:
Environ. Sci.: Water Res. Technol., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4EW00382A, Paper
M. A. Javed, W. C. Neil, S. A. Wade
Ferrous sulfate treatment used for copperâ€“nickel pipelines in maritime industries should be avoided in environments susceptible to microbially influenced corrosion.
